title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2601.4 - Request for other public records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2601.4 - Request for other public records

State Regulations

Requests for access and review of public records must be made
in writing at the office of the corporation at 625 Broadway, Albany, NY
12207-2997 on any working day from the hours of 8:30 a.m. to 12 noon and 1 p.m. to 4:45 p.m. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2601.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
